1 public class Print{
 2 public static void main(String[] args){
 3 int i=1;
 4 int j;
 5 while(i<=7){
 6 for(j=1;j<=i;j++)
 7 System.out.print("*");
 8 i=i+2;
 9 System.out.println();
10 }
11 i=5;
12 while(i>=1){
13 for(j=1;j<=i;j++)
14 System.out.print("*");
15 i=i-2;
16 System.out.println();
17 }
18 }
19 }
